TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DynatraceMonitorResource extends Azure.ResourceManager.ArmResource

Docs.summary: A Class representing a DynatraceMonitor along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct a from an instance of using the GetDynatraceMonitorResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetDynatraceMonitor method.
